page.title: 05THE FARM
page.content: The farm employs 4 full-time workers. A farm manager, a shepherd, a tractor driver and a general farm worker. The farm extends all over the island. The farm has 1000 ewes, mainly black face and cheviots, and a herd of 30 Highland Cattle. The farm makes its profit from the sale of beasts in the autumn so therefore the farm work revolves around the animals. Hay and oats are grown for winter fodder and concentrates are brought in. Although the farm is becoming increasingly mechanised traditional methods of stooking and stacking are still seen on the island. Potatoes are also grown for home consumption. Sheep are very time consuming and there are always dry stone dykes and fences to be maintained so the farm workers are never idle!
